flavor: "When your opponent is weak, strike. If you do not, he will become strong." - the Playbook
printed_text:
Play only if you made a successful run this turn.
Trash 1 unrezzed piece of ice you passed during your last run.
stripped_printed_text: Play only if you made a successful run this turn. Trash 1 unrezzed piece of ice you passed during your last run.

flavor: Omar goes through four, five keyboards per week, no two from the same decade.
printed_text: Look at the top 10 cards of your stack. If any of those cards are programs, you may install one of them, lowering the install cost by 5. Trash the rest of those cards.
stripped_printed_text: Look at the top 10 cards of your stack. If any of those cards are programs, you may install one of them, lowering the install cost by 5. Trash the rest of those cards.

printed_text: +2[mu] Whenever you breach HQ during a run, access 1 additional card for each piece of ice protecting HQ that you fully broke during that run. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_printed_text: +2 mu Whenever you breach HQ during a run, access 1 additional card for each piece of ice protecting HQ that you fully broke during that run. Limit 1 console per player.

flavor: Spiraling even higher, every feature of cyberspace sprawled before it.
printed_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 2[credit]: +2 strength. 2[credit], add this program to your grip: Derez 1 barrier this program fully broke during this encounter.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 2 credits: +2 strength. 2 credits, add this program to your grip: Derez 1 barrier this program fully broke during this encounter.

flavor: "I used to run stims, simsensies, the usual. I was scum. Now I run water. I'm a fragging hero."
printed_text: [click],[click]: Draw 3 cards. Shuffle 1 card from your grip into your stack.
stripped_printed_text: click,click: Draw 3 cards. Shuffle 1 card from your grip into your stack.

printed_text: 1[recurring-credit] Use this credit to pay for using icebreakers.
stripped_printed_text: 1 recurring credit Use this credit to pay for using icebreakers.

flavor: "I usually find something interesting in there. Just not what I was looking for."
printed_text: Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, instead of breaching R&D, you may choose 1 of the top 5 cards in R&D and access it.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, instead of breaching R&D, you may choose 1 of the top 5 cards in R&D and access it.

flavor: The personality must be bigger than the prop.
printed_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 3[credit]: +4 strength for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only by spending at least 1[credit] from a stealth card.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 3 credits: +4 strength for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only by spending at least 1 credit from a stealth card.

flavor: "Take this to Inez Delgado in Netcrimes. No one else."
printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. While secretly spending credits, players cannot spend 2[credit].
stripped_printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. While secretly spending credits, players cannot spend 2 credits.

flavor: "The Starlight Meditation Booths are available to refugees for free for the duration of the crisis."
printed_text: If you are tagged when your turn ends, force the Corp to "Trace 1 If unsuccessful, the Runner removes 1 tag." [trash],trash all cards in your grip: Prevent all meat damage.
stripped_printed_text: If you are tagged when your turn ends, force the Corp to "Trace 1 If unsuccessful, the Runner removes 1 tag." trash,trash all cards in your grip: Prevent all meat damage.

flavor: "I let the bioroids do a ride-along via remote, so they can see what pain really looks like." -Agent Valkyrie
printed_text: Install Wetwork Refit on a rezzed piece of bioroid ice as a condition counter with the text "Host ice gains "[subroutine] Do 1 brain damage." before all its other subroutines."
stripped_printed_text: Install Wetwork Refit on a rezzed piece of bioroid ice as a condition counter with the text "Host ice gains "Subroutine Do 1 brain damage." before all its other subroutines."

printed_text: The first time each turn the Runner passes a rezzed piece of bioroid ice, you may rez 1 bioroid card, paying 4[credit] less.
stripped_printed_text: The first time each turn the Runner passes a rezzed piece of bioroid ice, you may rez 1 bioroid card, paying 4 credits less.

flavor: "Does an alliance with the yakuza truly seem so strange? They are honorable businessmen, and women, just like us." -Rin Kimura, Chief NA Security
printed_text: Whenever you and the Runner reveal secretly spent credits, do 1 meat damage if you and the Runner spent a different number of credits.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you and the Runner reveal secretly spent credits, do 1 meat damage if you and the Runner spent a different number of credits.

flavor: "Keep your head down, keep moving, try not to attract attention."
printed_text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, trash the top card of R&D.
Draw 3 cards. Add 3 cards from HQ to the top of R&D in any order.
stripped_printed_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, trash the top card of R&D. Draw 3 cards. Add 3 cards from HQ to the top of R&D in any order.

printed_text:
When the Runner encounters Data Ward, he or she must pay 3[credit] or take 1 tag.
[subroutine] End the run if the Runner is tagged.
[subroutine] End the run if the Runner is tagged.
[subroutine] End the run if the Runner is tagged.
[subroutine] End the run if the Runner is tagged.
stripped_printed_text: When the Runner encounters Data Ward, he or she must pay 3 credits or take 1 tag. Subroutine End the run if the Runner is tagged. Subroutine End the run if the Runner is tagged. Subroutine End the run if the Runner is tagged. Subroutine End the run if the Runner is tagged.

flavor: Falstaff-337B; decrypt-ok; loc:0.258500, -79.920791 -ok; auth-ok; msg:KAR kill authority requested y/n?
printed_text: If the Runner is tagged, Drone Screen gains "Whenever the Runner initiates a run on this server, <trace>Trace 3</trace> If successful, do 1 meat damage (cannot be prevented)."
stripped_printed_text: If the Runner is tagged, Drone Screen gains "Whenever the Runner initiates a run on this server, Trace 3 If successful, do 1 meat damage (cannot be prevented)."

printed_text: Whenever an encounter with a piece of ice ends, place 1 power counter on Chief Slee for each unbroken subroutine on the encountered piece of ice. [click], 5 hosted power counters: Do 5 meat damage.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever an encounter with a piece of ice ends, place 1 power counter on Chief Slee for each unbroken subroutine on the encountered piece of ice. click, 5 hosted power counters: Do 5 meat damage.

printed_text: When you rez this ice, take 1 bad publicity. When the Runner encounters this ice, gain 2[credit] if there is an installed AI program. [subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 installed program. [subroutine] Gain 2[credit]. End the run. [subroutine] Gain 2[credit]. End the run.
stripped_printed_text: When you rez this ice, take 1 bad publicity. When the Runner encounters this ice, gain 2 credits if there is an installed AI program. Subroutine The Runner trashes 1 installed program. Subroutine Gain 2 credits. End the run. Subroutine Gain 2 credits. End the run.

flavor: When a shooting war threatens, the prudent course is to shoot first.
printed_text: Trash 1 installed card with an install cost equal to or less than the number of tags the Runner has.
stripped_printed_text: Trash 1 installed card with an install cost equal to or less than the number of tags the Runner has.

printed_text:
After you resolve this operation, end your action phase.
Shuffle 3 cards from Archives into R&D. Remove Preemptive Action from the game instead of trashing it.
stripped_printed_text: After you resolve this operation, end your action phase. Shuffle 3 cards from Archives into R&D. Remove Preemptive Action from the game instead of trashing it.
